en_question: A candy factory uses raw materials A, B, and C to produce three brands of candy (X, Y, Z). Each brand must respect the material percentage limits in Table 1-17. Raw materials incur the given costs and monthly availability limits, and each candy brand has a processing cost and selling price. Determine the kilograms of each brand to produce per month to maximize profit.
cn_question: 某糖果厂用原料 A、B、C 加工成三种不同牌号的糖果甲、乙、丙，满足表 1-17 中的含量约束、原料成本与每月用量限制，并考虑三种牌号糖果的加工费和售价。问每月应生产多少千克才能使利润最大。
